41  abstract public function exists($key);
42 
43  public function expired($key, $duration) {
44  if ($this->exists ( $key )) {
45  if (\is_int ( $duration ) && $duration !== 0) {
46  return \time () - $this->getTimestamp ( $key ) > $duration;
47  } else {
48  return false;
49  }
50  } else {
51  return true;
52  }
53  }
54 
64  public function store($key, $code, $tag = null, $php = true) {
65  $content = "";
66  if ($php)
67  $content = self::PHP_TAG;
68  $content .= $code . "\n";
69  $this->storeContent ( $key, $content, $tag );
70  }

73  return $this->_root;
74  }
